textBeforeTable: Specifications + More 2.38" H x 96" W x 1" D Dimensions: Panels may be reversed easily by twisting Wall track can be recessed into wall Level 1 and 2 allow for layered mounting Level 0 mounting allows for panels directly under track (wall mounting) Connector included for aligning wall tracks end-to-end Cool Grey color insert conceals fasteners Natural Anodized Aluminum finish Wall track pre-drilled with fasteners Features: Not only do they supply a wide range of products for the office environment, Peter Pepper Products also manufactures a great deal of products for use with training and classroom environments. Tactics Plus® wall track components will help you to make the most out of your space. With the two level Natural Anodized Aluminum wall track allows for interchangeable components to be arranged in any combination on level 1 or 2. Bi-passing panels nearly double the capacity of visual presentations. Level 0 allows for mounting directly under the track while level 1 and 2 hangers may be positioned for reversing any panel or mounting any panel across the corner. If you prefer, you can recess the track into the wall and only use levels 1 and 2 instead of 0. Peter Pepper Products aids in getting your point across! Note: All Whiteboards with dimensions smaller
